message.content:
vaccine coverage
community protection
infection rate
immune response
population immunity
herd protection
vaccination levels
disease transmission
immunity threshold
measles outbreak

Note: These terms are related to the concept of herd immunity, which refers to the level of immunity in a population that is necessary to prevent the spread of a contagious disease. The terms provided include concepts related to the mechanisms of herd immunity, as well as examples of diseases and factors that can affect its effectiveness.
